featured.text: When the kernels start 38 , shake the pot to let the steam escape and to let the unpopped kernels fall to the bottom.
Green tea leaves are heated in steam, rolled, and dried.
The invention of the steam engine, which was used to power heavy machines, brought about a _____ change in society.
Before Moran arrived, Yellowstone in the popular imagination was a harsh, wild place with hot water and steam coming out of hellish holes in the ground.

definition.en_def: The vapor into which water is converted when heated, forming a mist of tiny water droplets.
definition.example: The steam from the boiling kettle filled the kitchen.
